entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
